item.title: Reddit is rolling out age verification in the UK
item.description: Reddit users in the United Kingdom will now be blocked from accessing “certain mature content” unless they complete the platform’s new age verification process. Reddit announced on Monday that UK user

item.title: Where are the iPhone’s WebKit-less browsers?
item.description: It’s been 16 months since a DMA ruling allowed iOS developers like Google and Mozilla to use their own browser engines in the EU, so… where are they? According to the Open Web Advocacy (OW

item.title: Tornado Cash Made Crypto Anonymous. Now One of Its Creators Faces Trial
item.description: Roman Storm, one of the developers of crypto-anonymizing tool Tornado Cash, will stand trial in New York starting July 14. His supporters claim the freedom to develop software is under threat.
